mapper.select: SELECT id, parent_id as parentId, parent_name AS parentName, NAME, depart_id as departId, depart_name as departName, setting_basis as settingBasis, type, CODE, LEVEL, come_from as comeFrom, is_area as isArea, is_ningzhengfa as isNingzhengfa, is_qinzhengfa as isQinzhengfa, is_qubianban as isQubianban, notes , record_status as recordStatus, creator_account as creatorAccount, created_time as createdTime, modifier_account as modifierAccount, modified_time as modifiedTime FROM tb_sp_power WHERE id = #{id} and record_status != 0

SELECT t.id, t.parent_id as parentId, t.parent_name AS parentName, t.name, t.depart_id as departId, t.depart_name as departName, t.setting_basis as settingBasis, t.type, t.code, t.level, t.come_from as comeFrom, t.is_area as isArea, t.is_ningzhengfa as isNingzhengfa, t.is_qinzhengfa as isQinzhengfa, t.is_qubianban as isQubianban, t.notes FROM tb_sp_power t WHERE record_status != 0 and t.parent_id = #{id}
